product_name: DeLorme Rhode Island and Connecticut Atlas and Gazetteer
long_description: The DeLorme Connecticut and Rhode Island Atlas and Gazetteer features topographic maps along with roads, trails and recreational hotspots. Full color shaded relief topographic maps are easy to read; Scale 1:65,000, one inch represents one mile; contour interval of 100 feet. Each large format page (11 x 15.5 inches) covers an area of 10.2 x 13.6 miles; GPS grid and tick marks allow ease of use with GPS unit. Full index of place names and map features (lakes, rivers, mountains, beaches, etc.); index of street names for city maps. Full city street maps for Bridgeport, Hartford, New Haven and Providence. In-depth gazetteer includes information on attractions, campgrounds, fishing, golf courses, historic sites, hunting, paddling and recreation areas. Also includes information on scenic drives, ski areas, trails and unique natural features; each entry is cross-referenced to the corresponding map. Great for in-vehicle reference, exploring back roads, planning and navigation, business travel and armchair journeys. Copyright 2003, DeLorme Publishing; 60 pp. of maps; 80 pp. overall.
short_description: The DeLorme Connecticut and Rhode Island Atlas and Gazetteer features topographic maps along with roads, trails and recreational hotspots.
